ground_truth_reviews.comment: The file is opened without using a context manager (`with` statement). If an exception occurs during `json.load(file)` (e.g., due to malformed JSON), `file.close()` will not be called, resulting in a resource leak. Please use a `with open(...) as f:` block to ensure the file is closed automatically, even in the case of an error.

title: feat: Add endpoint to read configuration
body: This change introduces a new `/config` endpoint to read and return application settings from a `config.json` file.
